title: Increase in USD value - U.S. exports fall

content.question: An increase in the international value of the United States dollar will tend to cause

choices.label: the national income of the United States to increase
employment in the manufacturing sector of the United States to increase
the inflation rate in the United States to increase
the growth rate of the United States economy to increase

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
